text: "Light of Day" sometimes credited as "(Just Around the Corner to the) Light of Day" is a 1987 song written by Bruce Springsteen and performed by Joan Jett and Michael J. Fox. It was taken from the 1987 movie Light of Day. It went to number 33 in the United States. == References == Category:1987 songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs Category:Joan Jett and The Blackhearts songs
title: Light of Day (song)
